name: Unfortunate Spacemen
description: Unfortunate Spacemen is a co-op / multiplayer game about Shapeshifting Space Based Murder and Deception! As a hapless yet brave spaceman employed by "The Company" you'll work diligently to defend and be rescued from failing outposts, but not everyone around you is who they claim to be...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space
